trans-unit.resname: DDJ·3 | Goblin Electromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的瞬间与法术咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·21 | Izzet Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDJ·21 | Izzet Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
trans-unit.target: •除非目标非生物咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·21 | Izzet Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature.

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·21 | Izzet Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·30 | Street Spasm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标不由你操控且不具飞行异能的生物造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·30 | Street Spasm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
trans-unit.target: 超载{X}{X}{R}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·45 | Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord | Card Name
DDJ·45 | Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.\n{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.\nSacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。{1}{B}{G}，牺牲另一个生物：每位对手各失去若干生命，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的力量。牺牲一个沼泽和一个树林：将贾雷从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·52 | Korozda Guildmage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}{G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}{G}：直到回合结束，目标生物得+1/+1且获得威吓异能。（它只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·52 | Korozda Guildmage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}{G}，牺牲一个非衍生物的生物：派出X个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物，X为所牺牲之生物的防御力。

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·56 | Dreg Mangler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDJ·56 | Dreg Mangler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Scavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 食腐{3}{B}{G}（{3}{B}{G}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。只能于法术时机食腐。）
